1370: Abelkijn was born in Marcktgang in 1370.
Got married to Moerseil at age 31 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Moerseil, Lelien, at age 31.
1371: Had a son with Moerseil, Breghtgherus, at age 32.
1372: Had a son with Moerseil, Maelkin, at age 33.
1373: Had a daughter with Moerseil, Aleydis, at age 34.
1377: Lost daughter Heile when Heile was 0 years old.
Moerseil gave birth to their stillborn daughter Heile in 1377.
1379: Had a son with Moerseil, Snellard, at age 40.
